review: I want to buy one, but one thing stops me. The Bluetooth remote system. I may be in the minority here, but I have most of my equipment out of sight and use a UHF radio Universal Remote to control everything in my AV system with just one remote control unit. The remote transmits via UHF to an infrared emitter in the equipment closet. So, since I cannot use my Universal Remote to control the Fire TV unit, I will have to use multiple remote controls which is what I want to avoid. So, if Amazon would make model of the Fire TV with an infrared remote instead of the Bluetooth, or make a unit that has both, I would buy one in a minute.One other feature I would like to see is compatibility with Windows Media Player for streaming music.
